Summary Motivated Sales and Marketing Executive with vision, strategy, and the will to win business. Highly trusted by customers, peers, and leadership staff. Award winning Top Achiever with outstanding ability to lead high performance sales and marketing teams successfully. Mission driven individual contributor with a strong passion for communicating results and sharing ideas that impact cross functional teams and all stake holders involved. Positive thinker, optimistic leader, and energetic problem solver who listens, convinces decision makers, and achieves results that impact the bottom line. Versatile at driving revenue generating business solutions and penetrating a variety of vertical industries. 
.  
 
Specialties: 
•	Building strategic trusted customer relationships 
•	Exceeding sales goals and marketing objectives 
•	Exceptional forecasting and planning 
•	Influential at winning the business  
•	Skilled at developing successful promotions 
•	Successful at category management  
•	Negotiated high profit product assortments 
•	Experienced in supply chain management 
•	Proven to drive sales teams to success

•	Outstanding at communication and presentation Experience Regional Sales Manager GBS Linens, Inc. September 2014  – Present (1 year) Dallas/Fort Worth Ultimately responsible for growth of the Texas territory and the development and expansion of surrounding areas. Directs the sales force and assigns sales territories to a team of Account Executives who are based in major metropolitan areas within the region. Acts as the liaison between the Anaheim corporate office, manufacturing facility in Dallas, satellite offices in Houston, and San Antonio/Austin, and the national sales teams at GBS Linens. Brought in to the organization to assist the company by driving client base partnerships, offering superior service over competitors, marketing specialty upscale products, and moving forward to take steps in GBS’ plan of nationwide expansion. 
 
GBS Linens is a full-service tablecloth and chair cover supplier offering linen rental, laundry, sales, and restoration for the special event, party rental, and hospitality industries. We service customers across the United States with locations in Southern California, Northern California, Arizona, Nevada, Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Florida. 
 
Our key competitive advantages include a broad and deep rental inventory, strong customer service, competitive pricing, and the use of innovative technology such as RFID (radio frequency identification) for inventory tracking. 
 
We have built the largest specialty linen rental inventory in the industry and our products fit into a wide variety of budgets. From our Solid Linen straight through our high end fabrics such as Lamour, Crinkle, Pintuck, and Spandex, you will find an amazing array of fabrics to choose from. 
 
"Because it's YOUR reputation on the table" Regional Manager - Central US/Canada Sonetics Corporation March 2012  –  August 2013  (1 year 6 months) Dallas/Fort Worth Responsible for 10 States Coverage (Plain States/Gulf States) and Alberta Canada. Sold Firecom® communication products that focused on Fire, Ambulance, Police, EMS and the First Responder markets. Sold Sonetics® communication products into Call Centers, Manufacturing, Transportation, Marine, Military, Aviation, Utilities, Public Works, Municipal, and Petro-Chemical verticals. National Sales Representative Sealeze May 2011  –  January 2012  (9 months) Dallas/Fort Worth Dedicated to driving sales of the Sealeze® family of industrial products throughout the USA market. Also moved products to International customers to increase overall revenue and bottom line profits. Sales Manager - Partner Relationship Manager Upsite Technologies, Inc. August 2009  –  January 2011  (1 year 6 months) Dallas/Fort Worth Responsible for sales of KoldLok® and HotLok® products and Upsite® Services and Solutions. Territory focus included half of the United States and Asia Pacific. Consumer Channel Manager Intel Corporation January 2008  –  April 2009  (1 year 4 months) Dallas/Fort Worth Managed Intel’s consumer channel business needs in the south central region. Primary Program and Account Manager for Radio Shack, Conn’s Appliances, Rent-A-Center, and AAFES.com. Drove business at Wal-Mart, Sams Club, and Costco. Concurrently managed 35 sales and marketing salespersons in multi-state area. Regional Channel Manager Intel Corporation January 2002  –  January 2008  (6 years 1 month) Dallas/Fort Worth Executed sales initiatives and manages a 35 person sales team in South Central territory including Texas, Arkansas, Oklahoma, and Louisiana. Coordinated partnerships with OEMs like HP, Creative, NVIDIA, Apple, Maxtor, Toshiba, Dlink, NEC and Microsoft. Trained and sold Intel LANDesk Management Software Suite and the network management applications that automated administrators' daily chores including remote OS and software deployment, hardware and software inventory, and performance monitoring. Kept partners abreast on IT related products, virtualization, and introduced private/hybrid cloud concepts.. Territory Product Sales Representative Intel Corporation February 1993  –  January 2002  (9 years) Dallas/Forth Worth Executed ultimate direct sales of Intel’s Branded Products. Completed the sales of Intel’s CPG lines to Wal-Mart, Sam’s Club, and CompUSA. Also executed SMB Networking products sales through IngramMicro,TechData,and D&H distributors. Ensured proper category placement was achieved for Anypoint® Home Networking,InBusiness® Commercial Networking, PC Cameras, and Wireless product lines. Regional Sales Manager GBS Linens, Inc.
